column2:
meltfinal<-reshape2::melt(final, id = c("Sub","Group","Gender","Studycomb"), measure.vars = colnames(final)[grepl('TF1.y_norm',colnames(final),fixed = TRUE)], variable.name = "condition",value.name = "amplitude")
#need to assign conditions
attention<- ifelse((grepl('attended',meltfinal$condition, fixed = TRUE)),'attended','unattended')
oddball<-ifelse((grepl('Lh' ,meltfinal$condition, fixed = TRUE) | 
                 grepl('Hh' ,meltfinal$condition, fixed = TRUE)),'frequent','rare')
pitch<-ifelse((grepl('L' ,meltfinal$condition, fixed = TRUE)),'low','high')
meltfinal<-data.frame(meltfinal,attention,oddball,pitch)
meltfinal$Group = as.factor(meltfinal$Group)
meltfinal$Gender = as.factor(meltfinal$Gender)
meltfinal$StudyID = as.factor(meltfinal$Studycomb)
meltfinal$Group = plyr::revalue(meltfinal$Group,c("1"="SCZ","3"="BP","5"="CON","6"="SREL"))
my_mod<-afex::aov_ez(data = meltfinal, dv = "amplitude", id = "Sub", within = c("attention", "oddball"), between= c("Group"), covariate = c("Gender","Studycomb"), type =3)
More than one observation per cell, aggregating the data using mean (i.e, fun_aggregate = mean)!
Contrasts set to contr.sum for the following variables: Group, Gender, Studycomb
